title: Silver adc in need on support main
body: i have recently been promoted to silver 1 and am a adc main. I have been having trouble with my supports and need some one reliable and who i can count on. Hit me up here or my in game name : Ekkologist. {{champion:22}}

replies.body:
If you're looking for players to play with, it's best to use the [**Team Recruitment**](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment) sub-board. As such, we're going to close this thread because it's in the wrong sub-board. If you have any questions, please drop us a message in the [**Player Behaviour**](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour) sub-board. 

Cheers!
+rep decent for s1, very feminine dick tho

hey man really would love to play with you, im a support main but im stuck in cancer on my new account i was silver 3 on my good one but it got banned _rip_ i play a pretty good thresh and a really good galio supp may not seem good but its a lot of pressure on the other two adc id be more then happy to team up and duo que 
{{champion:3}} 
if looking for a friend to climb with 
CRIMSONB04R or CRIMSONBO4R  cant remeber which but there only one of me. if you send friend ill accept it and lets get too plat or even challenger
